topic.title: For Android application
topic.shortdesc: Configure GLPI webservice for the Android application

body.p: Configure this only if you want to use Android application.

Into GLPI, go to menu Plugins > Web Services, and add a new webservice. Set these values:
Name: Android glpi_monitoring
Actived Services: Yes
Compression enabled: No (not tested with compression enabled)
Log connections: No (activate it if you require trace of connections)
Debug: No (activate for debug)
SQL pattern for services: monitoring.*
IP address range: if you have a fixed IP on your Android phone, set this IP in the 2 inputs, else you can set big range like 1.0.0.1 to 254.254.254.254
User name: (keep empty in this case)
Password: (keep empty in this case)
Click on add button, the webservice for the Android application is created and allowed.
